scripts.docker-stop: docker stop fabric.ehr || echo 'no container to stop'
scripts.docker-remove: docker rm fabric.ehr || echo 'no container to remove'
scripts.docker: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-remove && npm run docker-build && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 -e SQLServer=IMRANLAPTOP --name fabric.ehr fabric.ehr
scripts.docker-publish: docker build -t imranq2/fabric.ehr . && docker push imranq2/fabric.ehr
